external_references.source_name: AADInternals Azure AD On-Prem to Cloud
external_references.description: Dr. Nestori Syynimaa. (2020, July 13). Unnoticed sidekick: Getting access to cloud as an on-prem admin. Retrieved September 28, 2022.

objects.description: [AADInternals](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0677) can inject a malicious DLL (`PTASpy`) into the `AzureADConnectAuthenticationAgentService` to backdoor Azure AD Pass-Through Authentication.(Citation: AADInternals Azure AD On-Prem to Cloud)
